TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebPartManagerInternals extends System.Object

summary.span: 分离到由 控件使用并且可由扩展该控件的网页开发人员重写的单独的类方法中，但是网页开发人员很少需要使用这些方法。

span.span: Isolates into a separate class methods that are used by the control and can be overridden by developers who extend the control, but are rarely needed by page developers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是 Web 部件控件集中最大的类。The class is the largest class in the Web Parts control set. 它也是最重要的 Web 部件类, 因为它用于包含 Web 部件控件的每个网页上, 并协调和管理页面上的所有 Web 部件控件。It is also among the most important Web Parts classes because it is used on every Web page that contains Web Parts controls, and it coordinates and manages all Web Parts controls on a page. 由于类频繁使用, 并且因为它包含如此多的公开方法, 因此, 扩展控件的控件开发人员通常需要一些方法, 这些方法包含在类中。 Because the class is used so frequently, and because it contains so many exposed methods, some methods needed mostly by control developers who are extending the control are contained in the class. 这种将不太常用的方法隔离到类中可简化类的 API, 而隔离的方法不会出现在 IntelliSense 中的对象上。This isolation of less-used methods into the class simplifies the API of the class, and the isolated methods do not appear on the object in IntelliSense. 使用类的开发人员可能会遇到这样的情况: 需要从控件继承并对其进行广泛的自定义。Developers who use the class are likely to have scenarios where they need to inherit from the control and customize it extensively. 例如, 如果你要使用自定义显示模式、自定义区域、自定义谓词、自定义控件和基础 Web 部件用户界面 (UI) 的其他扩展构建 Web 门户应用程序或打包的一组 Web 部件控件 (全部) 您将需要重写和扩展某些成员。For example, if you are building a Web portal application or a packaged set of Web Parts controls with custom display modes, custom zones, custom verbs, custom controls, and other extensions of the base Web Parts user interface (UI), in many cases (not all) you will need to override and extend some of the members. 尽管类是密封的, 因此您不能从它继承, 因此您的自定义类可能需要调用多个方法才能管理页上 Web 部件控件。And although the class is sealed so you cannot inherit from it, your custom class will likely need to call a number of the methods in order to manage Web Parts controls on a page. > [!NOTE] > 与类一样 , 类提供的服务器控件没有 UI, 并且在页面上从不可见。 Like the class, the class provides a server control that has no UI and is never visible on a page. 与不同 , 类决不会在页的标记中声明; 它完全是执行后台任务的辅助角色对象。Unlike , the class is never declared in the markup of a page; it is strictly a worker object that performs background tasks. 使用此方法的典型方法是通过类进行演示, 该类通过受保护的属性来引用它, 并使用被引用的对象调用方法。The typical way of using it is demonstrated by the class, which references it by means of the protected property, and uses the referenced object to call the methods. 类只包含方法; 没有属性或事件。The class contains only methods; there are no properties or events. 类中的所有方法都涉及管理控件或控件之间的连接。All the methods in the class involve managing controls, or connections between controls. 若要处理控件 , 包括添加它们 ()、删除它们、处理事件的方法、获取或设置与其区域的关系的详细信息 (例如和 ),或设置基本控件属性 (例如, 和)。 To handle controls, includes methods for adding them (), removing them ), handling events ), getting or setting details about their relationship to their zone (for example, and ), or setting basic control properties (for example, and ). 若要处理连接 , 包括用于删除连接的方法 (), 设置要使用的转换器对象 (), 设置是否共享连接以及是否为静态连接 (和)。将连接错误消息设置为使用 ()。To handle connections, includes methods for deleting them (), setting which transformer object to use (), setting whether a connection is shared and whether it is static ( and ), and setting a connection error message to use ().

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是终止网页上两个或其他服务器控件之间的现有连接的过程中的一个步骤。 The method is one step in the process of terminating an existing connection between two or other server controls on a Web page. 它将属性值设置为`true` , 以指示`connection`已删除。It sets the property value to `true` to indicate that `connection` is deleted.

span.span: A that resides in a zone.

span.span: Gets the ID of a zone that contains the specified or server control.

returns.span: 表示包含 的区域的 ID 的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents the ID of the zone that contains .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回包含`webPart`参数所引用的控件的区域的 ID。 The method returns the ID of the zone that contains the control referenced by the `webPart` parameter. > [!NOTE] > 的 属性`webPart`引用包含`webPart`的实际区域对象, 而不是区域的 ID。The property of `webPart` references the actual zone object that contains `webPart`, not the ID of the zone. 如果`webPart`当前已关闭, 则其 属性的值为`null`, 并且方法将返回在关闭之前处于中的最后一个`webPart`区域的 ID。If `webPart` is currently closed, the value of its property is `null`, and the method will return the ID of the last zone that `webPart` was in prior to being closed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法保存在用户将网页上的控件配置为控件之间的连接的一部分时创建的配置数据。 The method saves configuration data that is created when a user configures a control on a Web page as part of a connection between controls. 然后, 使用方法在 每次呈现控件时重新加载此配置数据。This configuration data is then reloaded each time the control is rendered, by using the method.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetConnectErrorMessage (System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart, string connectErrorMessage);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetConnectErrorMessage(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart, string connectErrorMessage) cil managed

param.name: webPart
param.span: 参与和另一个控件的连接的 。

span.span: A that participates in a connection with another control.

param.name: connectErrorMessage
param.span: 包含错误信息文本的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains the text of the error message.

summary.span: 建立错误信息，并且使得负责呈现 控件的 对象呈现该消息而不是呈现控件的内容。

span.span: Establishes an errors message, and causes the object that is responsible for rendering a control to render that message rather than the contents of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法可以将错误消息与参与连接的控件相关联。 The method allows you to associate an error message with a control that participates in connections. 如果在其他控件与`webPart`参数所引用的控件建立连接时出现错误, 则在连接过程失败后, 错误消息将显示在用户界面 (UI) 中, 而不是`webPart`.If an error occurs when another control is forming a connection with the control referenced by the `webPart` parameter, then after the connection process has failed, the error message is displayed in the user interface (UI), rather than the contents of `webPart`. 与 关联`webPart`的对象在其方法中呈现错误消息。The object associated with `webPart` renders the error message in its method.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法指示是否`webPart`具有共享个性化数据。 The method indicates whether `webPart` has shared personalization data. 传递给方法的`hasSharedData`参数值将分配`webPart`给控件的属性。The value of the `hasSharedData` parameter that is passed into the method is assigned to the `webPart` control's property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法指示是否`webPart`具有单独的用户个性化数据, 而不是共享数据。 The method indicates whether `webPart` has individual user personalization data, as opposed to shared data. 方法将`hasUserData`参数的值分配`webPart`给控件的属性。The method assigns the value of the `hasUserData` parameter to the `webPart` control's property.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

param.span: 此方法为其设置 属性的 。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether a is closed on a page.

summary.span: 设置 控件的 属性。

span.span: Sets the property of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法设置的`webPart`属性。The method sets the property of `webPart`. 此方法实际上不会关闭`webPart`; 它仅设置指示是否`webPart`已关闭的属性。This method does not actually close `webPart`; it only sets the property that indicates whether `webPart` is closed.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

summary.span: 设置 控件的 属性或 对象的 属性。

span.span: Sets the property of a control or the property of a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用基类中的方法, 以设置一个属性, 该属性指示控件的特定实例是否共享。The method calls a method in a base class to set a property that indicates whether a particular instance of a control is shared. 在 Web 部件控件集中, 共享控件表示对页的所有用户都可见的控件。In the Web Parts control set, a shared control means a control that is visible to all users of a page. 这与每个用户的控件不同, 后者仅对向页面添加控件的特定用户可见。This is in contrast to a per-user control, which is visible only to the specific user who added the control to the page. > [!NOTE] > 有关个性化设置和共享与每用户控件的详细信息, 请参阅[Web 部件个性化概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z36h8be9(v=vs.100))。For more on personalization and shared versus per-user controls, see [Web Parts Personalization Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z36h8be9(v=vs.100)).

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetIsShared (System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart, bool isShared);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetIsShared(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart, bool isShared) cil managed

param.name: webPart
param.span: 此方法为其设置 属性的 。

span.span: A for which this method sets the property.

param.name: isShared
param.span: 指示 是否为共享的布尔值。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether is shared.

summary.span: 设置 控件的 属性。

span.span: Sets the property of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法实际上不会使`webPart`参数引用的控件共享; 它仅设置指示`webPart`当前是否共享的属性。The method does not actually cause the control referenced by the `webPart` parameter to be shared; it only sets the property that indicates whether `webPart` is currently shared.

span.span: Sets the property of a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法实际上不会使`connection`参数引用的控件共享; 它仅设置指示`connection`当前是否共享的属性。The method does not actually cause the control referenced by the `connection` parameter to be shared; it only sets the property that indicates whether `connection` is currently shared.

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether is a standalone control.

summary.span: 设置 控件的 属性。

span.span: Sets the property of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法设置属性。The method sets the property. 如果`true` 控件上的此属性设置为, 则表示该控件不包含在区域中。When this property is set to `true` on a control, it means that the control is not contained within a zone.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

summary.span: 设置 控件的 属性或 对象的 属性。

span.span: Sets the property of a control or the property of a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用基类中的方法, 以设置一个属性, 该属性指示控件的特定实例是否为静态的。The method calls a method in a base class to set a property that indicates whether a particular instance of a control is static. 在 Web 部件控件集中, 静态控件是在网页的标记中声明的控件。In the Web Parts control set, a static control is a control that is declared in the markup of a Web page. 这与动态控件相反, 动态控件可以通过编程方式添加到页面, 也可以由用户从控件目录添加。This is in contrast to a dynamic control, which is either added to a page programmatically, or added by a user from a catalog of controls. 静态控件本质上是共享控件, 这意味着它对于页面的所有用户都是可见的, 尽管用户可以关闭静态控件, 但绝不能删除 (永久删除) 它。A static control is inherently a shared control, meaning that it is visible to all users of a page, and although users can close a static control, they can never delete (permanently remove) it. > [!NOTE] > 有关个性化设置、静态控件和动态控件以及共享控件与基于用户控件的详细信息, 请参阅[Web 部件个性化概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z36h8be9(v=vs.100))。For more on personalization, static versus dynamic controls, and shared versus per-user controls, see [Web Parts Personalization Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z36h8be9(v=vs.100)).

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetIsStatic (System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart, bool isStatic);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetIsStatic(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart, bool isStatic) cil managed

param.name: webPart
param.span: 为其设置属性值的控件。

span.span: The control for which the property value is being set.

param.name: isStatic
param.span: 指示 是否为静态的布尔值。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether is static.

summary.span: 设置 控件的 属性。

span.span: Sets the property of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于设置参数所引用的控件的属性值。 `webPart`The method is used to set the property value of the control referenced by the `webPart` parameter. 如果`webPart`在网页标记中的某个区域内声明, 此方法会将属性值设置为`true`。If `webPart` is declared within a zone in the markup of a Web page, this method sets the property value to `true`. 如果`webPart`以编程方式添加到页, 或者通过用户的 Web 部件用户界面 (UI) 添加, 则此方法会将属性值设置为`false`。If `webPart` is added to a page programmatically, or by a user through the Web Parts user interface (UI), then this method sets the property value to `false`.

summary.span: 设置 对象的 属性。

span.span: Sets the property of a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于设置参数所引用的连接的属性值。 `connection`The method is used to set the property value of the connection referenced by the `connection` parameter. 如果`connection`在网页的标记中声明, 此方法会将属性值设置为`true`。If `connection` is declared in the markup of a Web page, this method sets the property value to `true`. 如果`connection`以编程方式添加到页, 或者通过用户的 Web 部件用户界面 (UI) 添加, 则此方法会将属性值设置为`false`。If `connection` is added to a page programmatically, or by a user through the Web Parts user interface (UI), then this method sets the property value to `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetTransformer(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection connection, class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer transformer) cil managed
Public Sub SetTransformer (connection As WebPartConnection, transformer As WebPartTransformer)

param.name: connection
param.span: 创建服务器控件之间的连接的 。

span.span: A that creates a connection between server controls.

param.name: transformer
param.span: 将与 一起使用的 。

span.span: A to be used with .

summary.span: 分配一个将在两个服务器控件之间的连接中使用的 对象。

span.span: Assigns a object to be used in a connection between two server controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当两个服务器控件之间的连接需要转换器以便使用者控件可以解释提供程序控件中的数据时, 将调用方法来向对象提供特定对象。When a connection between two server controls requires a transformer so that the consumer control can interpret data from the provider control, the method is called to supply a specific object to the object. 如果连接已分配有一个转换器, 则`transformer`参数引用的对象将重写现有对象, 否则将使用`transformer`参数中引用的对象。If the connection already has a transformer assigned to it, the object referenced by the `transformer` parameter overrides the existing one; otherwise, the object referenced in the `transformer` parameter is used. 每次调用方法时,控件都使用方法来建立需要转换器的连接。The control uses the method whenever you call the method to establish a connection that requires a transformer.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetZoneID (System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart, string zoneID);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetZoneID(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart, string zoneID) cil managed

param.name: webPart
param.span: 正在设置其 属性值的 。

span.span: The whose property value is being set.

param.name: zoneID
param.span: 包含 所属的区域的 ID 的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains the ID of the zone that belongs to.

summary.span: 设置一个允许 或服务器控件保留包含区域的 ID 的属性。

span.span: Sets a property that enables a or server control to keep the ID of the containing zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当向区域添加 控件时,控件将调用此方法。This method is called by the control when a control is being added to a zone. 每个控件跟踪其所属的区域的 ID, 此方法设置保留 ID 值的属性。Each control tracks the ID for the zone it belongs to, and this method sets the property that keeps the ID value.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetZoneIndex (System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart, int zoneIndex);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetZoneIndex(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart, int32 zoneIndex) cil managed

param.name: webPart
param.span: 一个 控件，该方法为该控件设置区域索引。

span.span: A control for which the method sets a zone index.

param.name: zoneIndex
param.span: 其区域中相对于该区域中其他控件的 的索引。

span.span: The index of within its zone relative to other controls in the zone.

summary.span: 在特定控件所在区域中设置相对于该区域中其他 控件的该特定控件的索引。

span.span: Sets the index of the specified control within its zone relative to the other controls within the zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法确定在其区域中`webPart`占用的序号位置 (相对于区域中的其他服务器控件)。 The method determines the ordinal position that `webPart` occupies in its zone, relative to other server controls in the zone.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls
